name: ffs2018
description:
This is a game i am working on and i will never finish it, i know myself :D 

So it's a submission to the Finally Finish Something 2018 Game Jam

Of course you can find the source code on github https://github.com/albator2018/FFS2018

The game consist of bringing all the 10 guys to the house at the bottom right of the screen by clicking on each of them to select one and move by a simple click on the ground.
